articles.author: Ken Dilanian, Minyvonne Burke
articles.title: Gulf cartel apologizes after Americans are kidnapped and killed in Mexico - NBC News
articles.description: The Gulf cartel apologized Thursday after two American citizens were killed during an armed abduction last week in Mexico.
articles.content:
The Gulf cartel apologized Thursday after two American citizens were killed during an armed abduction last week in Mexico.
The cartel condemned the violence in a letter obtained by The Associated Pr… [+3265 chars]

articles.title: Letter claims cartel handed over men who killed Americans - Yahoo News

articles.author: Leslie Josephs, CNBC
articles.title: American Airlines CEO may increase pilot pay to up to $590,000 per year - NBC News
articles.description: American Airlines is prepared to raise pilot pay to match that of Delta’s, including 40% cumulative increases in a potential four-year deal, CEO Robert Isom said in a message to pilots.
articles.content:
American Airlines is prepared to raise pilot pay to match that of Deltas, including 40% cumulative increases in a potential four-year deal, CEO Robert Isom said in a message to pilots.
